metadata.title: Buhbo Modern Square Vase Planter 3.5" x 3.5" x 8 inch, Black
features: High quality 1.5mm thick steel grade 304 with a powder coated finish that goes with different types of d√©cor
Modern classic design featuring a minimalistic home decor looks great on the mantle, dining room, coffee table, kitchen, office or bathroom
Elevates the look of fresh flowers & botanicals, whether for wedding centerpieces, cemetery tombstones, bud vases, house warming gifts, or to brighten a room.
Overall Dimensions: Length-3.5 inch Width-3.5 inch Height-8 inch
Included (4) low profile rubber pads - Easy to install, provides increased stability, and protects planter and the surface that you place it on.
description: We love decor that fits into different styles and spaces. The clean simple design and shape makes the Buhbo vase a versatile piece. Use it for botanicals, utensils, and much more. Looks great as a centerpiece, in your office, on the mantle, or even in the kitchen. The heavy duty steel is hand welded to ensure a water tight enclosure. The best way to plant succulents/small plants is to use a layer of gravel, rock or pebbles on the bottom of the planter. Using an optional layer of charcoal over the gravel will improve the drainage and absorb impurities and odors. The top layer should be loose soil or cactus mix that drains well. * EASY TO CLEAN: Simply use a damp towel, or a little window cleaner will take care of it. The plants depicted in the picture are not included with the purchase.
